document_data.mainbody:
leskos Wavesilver was a lord and noble of the Waterdhavian noble house Wavesilver during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He lived within Wavesilver Villa located at the corner of Ivory Street and Flint Street in the central section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward.
Bleskos consort was Apryl Wavesilver and his second son and heir was Aristed Wavesilver.
